If your employer has multiple addresses, enter the address you physically go to work. Then add your employer’s headquarters address in the “How employment is related to course work” section. Enter if you are working part time or full time. Part time is defined as working less than 20 hours/week. Full time is defined as working more than 20 hours/week. Students are required to work a combined total of at least 20 hours/week across multiple employers during OPT. If you are working with multiple employers, submit an entry for each one in the SEVP Portal and select “Part time or Full time”. Do not delete any employers, unless it was entered in error and you did not work there. If you left an employer, add last day you worked. Do not delete any entries!
